page.description: Converts a decimal value to hexadecimal.
page.prototype: Hex_Value as C = dec_to_hex(N decimal_value [,L pad ])
page.discussion: The DEC_TO_HEX() function returns the hexadecimal equivalent of a decimal number.
page.example: dim dnum as N dim hnum as C dnum = 12 hnum = dec_to_hex(dnum) ? hnum ? "C"
